member.summary: Using local build of image processor nuget package

member.name: M:ImageService.Controllers.WithImageProcessorController.Get(System.String)
member.param: if requested file is .webp extension, the requesting browser is not Edge, Chrome, or Firefox, then .jpeg file format is returned.

member.summary: Create jpg or png image from uploaded webp image.
member.param: supported file extensions are jpg, jpeg, and png, note: don't enter '.'

member.summary: Create webp image from uploaded jpg or png image.
member.param: 1 to 100, means 1 too 100 percent, no decimals
